channel.title: I need help with some codes
channel.description:
hey!
i cant compiler, and i no idea why i got JDk and all that but... here is the codes to my soruce:
@echo off title simon is noob "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\JDK1.6.0_17\bin\java.exe" pause exit
and client:
@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/... :end echo Finished! pause exit
plz tell me what's wrong-.-
thank you :D

item.title: I need help with some codes
item.dc:creator: @iKapa iKapa
item.description:
@iKapa wrote:

“:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/…
:end”

Fuck sake dude. The answer is in the problem.

item.title: I need help with some codes
item.dc:creator: @owner_of_shadow owner of shadow
item.description:
@owner_of_shadow wrote:

hey!

i cant compiler, and i no idea why
i got JDk and all that but…
here is the codes to my soruce:

@echo off
title simon is noob
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\JDK1.6.0_17\bin\java.exe”
pause
exit

and client:

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/…
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

plz tell me what’s wrong-.-

thank you

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with some codes
